meanings.definition: A division or section of a larger district or area.
meanings.sent1: In our city, the subdistricts each have their own unique character.
meanings.sent2: The mayor visited all the subdistricts to understand the needs of the community.
meanings.sent3: The subdistricts decided to have a friendly competition to see who could plant the most trees.
meanings.sent4: The subdistricts were like puzzle pieces fitting perfectly into the larger district.
meanings.sent5: Navigating through the subdistricts felt like exploring a mini city within a city.

meanings.definition: The smallest administrative division within a district.
meanings.sent1: Students in the subdistricts were excited for the upcoming school field trip.
meanings.sent2: The subdistricts each had their own local government office.
meanings.sent3: The subdistricts held a bake sale to raise funds for a new playground.
meanings.sent4: The subdistricts were like small families within the larger district.
meanings.sent5: Walking through the subdistricts felt like stepping into a different world.
